ai-mil7.7.5:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the three factors should be called by one belonging to?”
ai-mil7.7.5:1.2_0: “Just as the tree called ‘Lord of flowers’,
ai-mil7.7.5:1.3_0: In the same way, the meditator with its fruit should be traveled by one who lives by the one who lives in fruit, wandering.
ai-mil7.7.5:1.4_0: This is the first kind of tree.
ai-mil7.7.5:2.1_0: Furthermore, great king, the trees are near to the people.
ai-mil7.7.5:2.2_0: In the same way, although ignorantly, for each person, for the sake of worldly gain, and for the benefit of worldly pleasures, because of dividing the teaching, and for the sake of worldly gain, enclosing the teaching.
ai-mil7.7.5:2.3_0: This is the second foot of a tree.
ai-mil7.7.5:3.1_0: Furthermore, a tree isn’t shadow or he does not make a hole.
ai-mil7.7.5:3.2_0: In the same way, when anyone with all the possessions, honor, and popularity can be conscious of the robbery, bandits, executed, and loving-kindness towards all beings, they should practice unsullied with pleasure and pain.
ai-mil7.7.5:3.3_0: This is the third kind of tree.
ai-mil7.7.5:3.4_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.7.5:4.1_0: ‘Then, sire, I am eighty years old,
ai-mil7.7.5:4.3_0: She was well-spoken and sweet cakes.
ai-mil7.7.5:5.1_0: The fifth enquiry is the fifth thing.
